name: Hanakomi Witches (Demo)
description:
Hanakomi Witches its an action shooting game inspired by many arcadia game from the past (mainly Atari/SEGA games) and also more modern SHMUPs  like Touhou.

Follow the story of Lucy and Rosemary in the Redllet Trick Flower Festival, as our protagonists travel across the world in search of challenges!

This demo consists of 2 stages in a single difficulty and main character.
Use your skills to beat both levels with both accuracy and swiftness!

Comments and suggestions are welcome. We hope you enjoy our game!

Game created by the Hanakomi Artware team:
- ren [project lead, programming]
- xiwangchan [artwork, story, character design]

Warning: Not suited for epilepsy or visually compromised players (very fast paced game with lots of action in short times).
